attribution.description: Text attribution to be displayed on the map.

tileOffsetBytes.description: Number of bytes used to encode the offset to a map tile in an index record. Defaults to 4 bytes.

tileMatrixSet.description: Collection of tile matrices defined at different scales with a common coordinate reference system.

tileMatrixCRS.description: Name of the Common TileMatrixSet definition (https://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/17-083r2/17-083r2.html#61) as defined in the 'OGC Two Dimensional Tile Matrix Set' OGC draft. Defaults to WebMercatorQuad.

indexFragmentOrdering.description: Specifies how the index fragments of an index are ordered. Defaults to row-major order

indexRecordOrdering.description: Specifies how the index records within an index fragment are ordered. Defaults to row-major order

dataOrdering.description: Specifies how the map tiles in the data section are ordered. Defaults to row-major order
